metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15701 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An unhandled exception in check_ignored() in apport/report.py can be exploited by a local attacker to cause a denial of service. If the mtime attribute is a string value in apport-ignore.xml, it will trigger an unhandled exception, resulting in a crash. Fixed in 2.20.1-0ubuntu2.24, 2.20.9-0ubuntu7.16, 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.6.

criterions.comment: apport: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
